price: 80.Nabii Luut mari umaané abaanamih fayxik sá Nabii Luutuk yab cinen waqdi:diggah anu qandee kee cato mara siinih luk suginniyoy, hinnay siinil yoo cattaah qokolta meelay maqar le luk suginniyoy isin faxxan uma taamaa kee sin fanat radak en keenik iyye.
arabic: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla law anna lī bikum quwwatan aw āwī ilā ruk'nin shadīdin
